author: Uri Peleg & Alon Gruss
name: RTL Text (Mac) by Uri Peleg and Alon Gruss
description:
The plugin allows editing an existing text box or creating a new one while retaining the original design + basic ability to emphasize bold words and italics.
How It Works?
Opening the plugin (Command + T) on an existing box allows editing of the text in the pop-up that opens (Enter or Escape closes the pop-up and approves the editing - UNDO needs to cancel the editing)
Opening the plug-in (Command + T) 'On Empty' creates a text box and pops up a popup where you can easily type text and see the product at the same time.
Add an asterisk with * asterisk before and after a word * (like Whatsapp) and italics with a lowercase before and after a word_

Text inside Repeat Grid ...
Controls the color of a specific word in the text.
